meanings.sent1: The esurient child devoured the entire pizza in minutes.
meanings.sent2: The wolf's esurient eyes were fixed on the piece of meat.
meanings.sent3: The esurient squirrel tried to steal all the nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her esurient ambition for success drove her to work tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: The esurient bear rummaged through the campsite looking for food.

meanings.definition: Having a strong desire for food or wealth
meanings.sent1: The esurient businessman always sought new investment opportunities.
meanings.sent2: The esurient cat meowed loudly for its dinner.
meanings.sent3: The esurient pirate searched for buried treasure with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: His esurient appetite for knowledge led him to read books non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The esurient crowd eagerly awaited the opening of the new restaurant.
